project.name: Cinolu Dashboard - User Integration
project.description: API Integration guide for Angular Dashboard (User role only)

endpoints.name: Sign Up
endpoints.description: Register a new user account

statusCodes.400: Invalid input or email already exists

endpoints.name: Sign In
endpoints.description: Authenticate user with email and password
endpoints.note: Token is set in HttpOnly cookie automatically

endpoints.name: Sign In with Google
endpoints.description: Initiate Google OAuth flow

endpoints.name: Google Auth Redirect
endpoints.description: Google OAuth callback endpoint

endpoints.name: Get Profile
endpoints.description: Retrieve current logged-in user profile

endpoints.name: Update Profile
endpoints.description: Update user profile information

endpoints.name: Update Password
endpoints.description: Change user password

statusCodes.400: Invalid old password or new password doesn't meet requirements

endpoints.name: Forgot Password
endpoints.description: Request password reset email

statusCodes.200: Email sent (even if email doesn't exist - for security)

endpoints.name: Reset Password
endpoints.description: Reset password using reset token

endpoints.name: Sign Out
endpoints.description: Logout current user

endpoints.name: Generate Referral Code
endpoints.description: Generate a unique referral code for current user

endpoints.name: Get My Referrals
endpoints.description: List all users referred by current user

endpoints.name: Upload Profile Picture
endpoints.description: Upload user profile picture
endpoints.note: Only user can upload their own profile picture

endpoints.name: Create Venture
endpoints.description: Create a new venture for the authenticated user

endpoints.name: Get My Ventures (Paginated)
endpoints.description: Get all ventures owned by current user with pagination
endpoints.dashboardUsage: Display user's ventures list with pagination

endpoints.name: Get My Ventures (Unpaginated)
endpoints.description: Get all ventures owned by current user without pagination

endpoints.name: Get Venture by Slug
endpoints.description: Get single venture details by slug

endpoints.name: Get Venture by ID
endpoints.description: Get single venture details by ID
endpoints.responseBody: Venture object (same as Get by Slug)

endpoints.name: Update Venture
endpoints.description: Update venture details (only owner can update)
endpoints.note: User can only update their own ventures

endpoints.name: Delete Venture
endpoints.description: Delete venture (only owner can delete)
endpoints.note: User can only delete their own ventures

endpoints.name: Upload Venture Logo
endpoints.description: Upload logo for a venture (only owner)

endpoints.name: Upload Venture Cover
endpoints.description: Upload cover image for a venture (only owner)

endpoints.name: Add Image to Venture Gallery
endpoints.description: Add image to venture gallery (only owner)

endpoints.name: Get Venture Gallery
endpoints.description: Get all gallery images for a venture

endpoints.name: Remove Image from Venture Gallery
endpoints.description: Remove image from venture gallery (only owner)

endpoints.name: Get Published Ventures
endpoints.description: Get all published ventures (for public viewing)
responseBody: Venture[] - only ventures where is_published = true

endpoints.name: Create Product
endpoints.description: Create a new product for a venture

statusCodes.400: Invalid input or venture not found

endpoints.name: Get My Products
endpoints.description: Get all products owned by current user (through their ventures)

endpoints.name: Get Product by Slug
endpoints.description: Get single product details by slug

endpoints.name: Update Product
endpoints.description: Update product details (only owner can update)
endpoints.note: User can only update products from their own ventures

endpoints.name: Delete Product
endpoints.description: Delete product (only owner can delete)
endpoints.note: User can only delete products from their own ventures

endpoints.name: Add Image to Product Gallery
endpoints.description: Add image to product gallery (only owner)

endpoints.name: Get Product Gallery
endpoints.description: Get all gallery images for a product

endpoints.name: Remove Image from Product Gallery
endpoints.description: Remove image from product gallery (only owner)

endpoints.name: Get User Stats
endpoints.description: Get statistics for current logged-in user

endpoints.name: Get Highlights
endpoints.description: Get highlighted items (promoted content)

fields.name: string
fields.referred_by_id: uuid | null - who referred this user

Venture.description: Represents a startup/business created by a user

fields.name: string - venture name
fields.problem_solved: string - what problem does it solve
fields.is_published: boolean - default false, true when ready for public
fields.stage: string | null - seed, early, growth, mature, etc.
fields.owner_id: uuid - user who owns this venture

fields.name: string - product name
fields.venture_id: uuid - venture this product belongs to

Gallery.description: Image gallery for ventures and products

fields.venture_id: uuid | null - if gallery for venture
fields.product_id: uuid | null - if gallery for product

fields.totalVentures: number - total ventures created by user

components.name: Venture Gallery Manager
displays: Gallery grid with upload and delete options

components.name: Product Gallery Manager
displays: Gallery grid with upload and delete options

components.name: Password Management
components.note: Change password requires old password verification

components.name: Referral List
displays: List of referred users with join date

angular20BestPractices.architecturePattern: Feature-based modular structure with standalone components
keyFeatures: inject() function instead of constructor DI
input() and output() for component APIs

patterns.serviceState: Use signals in services for shared state
patterns.effects: Use effect() for side effects based on signal changes

optimizations: Use OnPush change detection (default with standalone)
Implement virtual scrolling for long lists (@angular/cdk/scrolling)
Lazy load feature modules with loadComponent()
Use defer blocks for deferred loading

recommendations: Test guards and interceptors in isolation

createVenture.curl: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/ventures -H 'Authorization: Bearer {token}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"name":"My Startup","description":"A great startup","problem_solved":"Solves X","target_market":"SMEs"}'

angular.implementation: const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('logo', file); this.http.post(`/ventures/add-logo/${ventureId}`, formData)

createProduct.curl: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/products -H 'Authorization: Bearer {token}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"ventureId":"uuid","name":"Product Name","description":"Product desc","price":99.99}'

angular.implementation: const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('file', file); this.http.post(`/users/${userId}/profile-picture`, formData)
